alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN DALE AND COFFEE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boot Hill to 7 miles southeast of Dozier. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Novosel, Enterprise, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Dill, Turner Crossroads, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Arguta, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Marley Hill, and Camp Alaflo Bsa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
